document.full_text: costa rica on thursday created a massive new marine protected area in the eastern tropical pacific, which conservationists hope will offer endangered marine species such as hammerhead sharks and leatherback turtles a place of respite to recover from increasing pressures from humans.
document.title: costa rica creates 2.47 million acre marine park
lines_and_colors: costa rica on thursday created a massive new marine protected area in the eastern tropical pacific, which conservationists hope will offer endangered marine species such as hammerhead sharks and leatherback turtles a place of respite to recover from increasing pressures from humans.
